message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that.
I'm still interested, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. I really think that's a fair price for this product.
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
